desc: The World's Largest Importer of Personalized, Commemorative Delft Plates, Birth plates for parents, grandparents, family and friends. Baby Gifts, Baby Showers, Weddings, Anniversary, Baby Diapers.

layout.text:
There's no better heartwarming way
to record the birth of a baby!
Hand crafted by Dutch artists in Holland,
the Delft Birth Plate is the perfect gift for Parents,
